All original packing must be included. # Up for Sale is a 2018 Jackson HT6 Misha Mansoor Signature Pro Series Electric Guitar! Beautiful Scarlet Burst Finish! This is really cool. You are looking at a 2018 Jackson HT6 Misha Mansoor Signature Pro Series Electric Guitar. Misha Mansoor, lead guitarist for progressive metal band Periphery, has made a name for himself as a trailblazer of style and innovation over the past decade. Known for his speed and palm-muted lead attack known as djent, Mansoor has been a Jackson guitar player from nearly day one of his career. Mansoor and Jackson have now teamed up to bring you the Pro Series Signature Misha Mansoor Juggernaut HT6FM. The Mansoor Juggernaut HT6FM features a basswood body with flame maple top and a 1-piece bolt-on maple speed neck with graphite reinforcement and wrap-around heel for comfort. To add even more metal playability, the HT6FM also has a 16" flat-radius ebony fingerboard with 24 jumbo frets and offset inlay dots. Finally, a pair of smoking-hot Jackson MM1 humbuckers brings killer sonic versatility to this metal workhorse guitar. The Pro Series Signature Misha Mansoor Juggernaut HT6FM features a basswood body with flame maple top, one-piece bolt-on maple neck with graphite reinforcement and wrap-around heel for greater playing comfort, 16” flat radius ebony fingerboard with 24 jumbo frets, offset dot inlays, illuminating side-dots, and heel-mount truss rod adjustment wheel. Not willing to sacrifice tone, Mansoor spent considerable time working with Jackson to develop new, killer-sounding Jackson MM1 pickups, which can be shaped with a single volume control, a single tone control with push/pull select and a five-way blade switch. Available in a stage-stealing Scarlet Burst finish, this axe also features a Jackson HT6 string-through-body hardtail bridge, die-cast locking tuners, black hardware and reverse Jackson 3x3 (3 over, 3 under) AT-1 headstock. Tech Specs Body Type: Solidbody Body Shape: Juggernaut Left-/Right-handed: Right-handed Number of Strings: 6 Body Material: Basswood Top Material: Flame Maple Body Finish: Gloss Color: Scarlet Burst Neck Material: Maple Neck Shape: Speed Neck Radius: 16" Fingerboard Material: Ebony Fingerboard Inlay: Offset Dots Number of Frets: 24, Jumbo Scale Length: 25.5" Nut Width: 1.6875" Nut Material: Black Plastic Bridge/Tailpiece: Jackson HT6 String-through-body Hardtail Tuners: Jackson Die-cast Locking Neck Pickup: Jackson MM1 Humbucker Bridge Pickup: Jackson MM1 Humbucker Controls: 1 x volume, 1 x tone (push/pull tone select), 5-way blade pickup switch Beautiful Flame Maple Scarlet Burst Finish. Great Playing and Sounding Guitar. Super Fast "Speed" Neck. Our luthier did a complete setup. Brand new strings were installed. Gig ready on Arrival! Serial Number: ICJ1711097 Nut Width: 1.68" Weight: 7.55 lbs. Case Is NOT Included Due to CITES Treaty for Endangered Wood (Mahogany, Rosewood) We no longer ship out of the USA. For everyone else, you'll love this guitar. Pristine. Dripping with "Mojo". It is used. Not perfect. Overall, a really nice guitar. Look at the pictures closely. They will tell the story.
